data.name: نیکسی
data.description: NiKSi is a quick and trusted way to find inspiration and shop lifestyle products through a series of pictures that are categorized by style type and a number of other parameters.We connect shoppers, professionals in lifestyle industry and product owners with best-in-class technology, data, and business tools. NiKSi is founded by four members who are passionate about working on new and challenging ideas and creating value with full dedication.
